review: After much online reviewing of streaming products such as Google Chrome, Roku, Spark, etc, I purchased the Fire Stick, as I also have an Amazon Prime account. I have been extremely pleased! It has been very user friendly, has more memory than competitors and is10 -100 times faster loading streaming services/videos/music than our family smartphones on 4G LTE or our Xfinity home WiFi and with tablets, BD players, laptops and netbooks on our home WiFi wirelessly or through Lan cable.
author: retired_ronman
